definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Dr. Stevens has worked at the language institute since 1982.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文斯從1982年起就一直在語言學院工作。

sentences.english: My name is Captain Colter Stevens.
sentences.chinese: 我的名字是隊長科爾特史蒂文斯。

sentences.english: Stevens said that, but Frost could have said it, too.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文斯說的這句，但是弗羅斯特也可以這樣說。

sentences.english: Stephens will be deputizing for me while I am on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文斯將做我的代理人。

sentences.english: Crane shares these general ideas with Wallace Stevens.
sentences.chinese: 克萊恩和史蒂文斯有着共同的這些思想。

sentences.english: There's the New York of Crane, of Moore, of Stevens, too.
sentences.chinese: 克蘭，穆爾，史蒂文斯去了紐約。

sentences.english: Stevens is an outstanding poet among the symbolism poetic school.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文斯是象徵主義詩派中著名的詩人。

definition: Kohl (name)/Helmut Kohl (1930-2017), German CDU politician, Chancellor 1982-1998
horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
Brown (name)/Gordon Brown (1951-), UK politician, prime minister 2007-2010
McMillan or MacMillan (name)/Harold Macmillan (1894-1986), UK conservative politician, prime minister 1957-1963
